page.title: 05JOBS IN WANSFORD AREA
page.content: From our questionnaire we found that 74% of the householders had jobs,24% were retired and 2% were unemployed obviously unemployment is very rare in this area. Most of the people who have jobs, work in Peterborough and some even work in London. Some people had employment in the Wansford area, these included the butcher, policeman, antique dealer, hotelier and agricultural workers. The majority of the people in this area had well paid jobs: engineers, accountants, company managers, eye surgeon, solicitors and they often work at home. The people who work furthest away from Wansford and Yarwell generally work more hours. The average working person leaves Wansford at 8.00 am and returns at between 6.00-7.00 pm. 34% of the people in Wansford area have another worker in the household.
